abilities.name: Tunnel Rat
abilities.description: May Step through Vents.

abilities.name: Loyal
abilities.description: To Influence return all cubes on this card and place at least 1 more cube than was previously here.

abilities.name: Live Streams
abilities.description: If Jammers are OFF, Billionaire's and Fletcher's Sections act as if Lit and Cameras are ON.

abilities.name: Rich
abilities.description: Cannot be Bribed. When Activated, you may use a grey Bribe instead of your own. Grey Bribes only score if Billionaire escapes.

abilities.name: Breach
abilities.description: As an Action, may remove an adjacent Lock.

abilities.name: Fugitive
abilities.description: No actions taken with or against this Character will make a player Suspect.

abilities.name: Scientist
abilities.description: May perform a Free Section Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: ZeroBorn
abilities.description: May Free Step or Airlock into a zero Gravity Section instead of Free Pick Up or Drop.

abilities.name: Officer
abilities.description: If not Blackout, may Step (or if Down, be Dragged) through Locks, which are then removed.

abilities.name: Paranoid
abilities.description: To Influence, the active player must have a Colocated Conspirator. Cannot be Bribed.

abilities.name: Fast Talk
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked by Humans with Bludgeon in Lit Sections

abilities.name: Mimic Frameup
abilities.description: After Downing a Human in a Lit Section, the active player may choose another player who has a Colocated Conspirator to become Suspect instead.

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.description: Using Corpsicle's Kompromat will additionally give her a Bludgeon. Her Kompromat can be used even if Down, which will instantly Revive her if down.

abilities.name: Dying
abilities.description: May not be activated when Exhausted and gets no free Pick Up or Drop when activated.

abilities.name: Wormtongue
abilities.description: As an Action, move a cube on a Colocated Human's card to Betrayal.

abilities.name: Uncanny
abilities.description: It takes two Activation discs for this Character to become Exhausted.

abilities.name: Pride
abilities.description: Cannot be Robbed.

abilities.name: Adrenaline
abilities.description: Is not Downed by Hazards. Step or Airlock into Section with Hazard is always free.

abilities.name: A.I.
abilities.description: Can only perform Console actions. Characters Possessing Digital Assistant have Officer for Section actions and do not require Abandon ship to launch Pod.

abilities.name: Helpful
abilities.description: No player may have more than one influence cube on this Character.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.description: Has two Identity Cards.

abilities.name: Disassemble
abilities.description: As an Action, can Down self to Repair a Colocated Section Robot.

abilities.name: Remote Control
abilities.description: Cannot be Bribed, Influenced, or Activated Directly. As a Console Action Characters may perform an Action with any Live Drone.

abilities.name: Jury Rig
abilities.description: As an action, Repair a Colocated Damaged Section or Down Robot.

abilities.name: Hacker
abilities.description: May perform a Free Console Action instead of a Free Pick Up or Drop. If Jammers are OFF may perform Console Actions in any Section.

abilities.name: Investigator
abilities.description: Can Pick Up Kompromat or Manufacture Data from adjacent Sections.

abilities.name: Badge
abilities.description: May Rob Items as if in possession of a Gun.

abilities.name: Process Server
abilities.description: As an Action, Manufacture NDA into the Possession of all Colocated Humans and Robots.

abilities.name: Lawyer Up
abilities.description: As an Action may change a Colocated Innocent or Guilty PC's status to suspect.

abilities.name: Emergency Response
abilities.description: As an Action, may Revive a Human. Step of Airlock into Sections with Down Human is always Free.

abilities.name: EMP Burst
abilities.description: Damage Operative's Section. Down all Robots in it and Delete all Colocated Data.

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: May only Attack Fugitives, Monsters or non-innocent PCs. May not Sabotage.

abilities.name: Armored
abilities.description: Cannot be Attacked or Robbed by Bludgeon.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Perform an Action with a Colocated Unhelmeted Human, ignoring Self-Preservation. May only perform Telepathy Actions.

abilities.name: Acrobatics
abilities.description: Gains ZeroBorn: May Free Step or Airlock into a zero Gravity Section instead of Free Pickup or Drop

abilities.name: Hollow Promises
abilities.description: Upon Reveal gain and/or return all three grey Bribe tokens.

abilities.name: Missile
abilities.description: If Jammers OFF, place 1 time marker on one Unescaped Section. When time marker is resolved Damage that Section and Down all Colocated Characters. Only one inbound Missile at a time is allowed.

abilities.name: Extricate
abilities.description: Upon Reveal (even at Stationfall), flip the Rescue Ship to Pirate Ship. Pirate Ship will only rescue any Character Possessing Briefcase (even if Down)

abilities.name: Creatropism
abilities.description: During Botanist Player's Activation phase, if Fang Moss is not Possessed by a Live Character, Fang Moss may perform a Free Step or Annihilate a Down Colocated Human, Dropping its Items.

abilities.name: Mission First
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, return all of your Influence cubes in Betrayal to your pool.

abilities.name: Shapeshift Switch
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, if Live may swap locations with any Human or Robot NPC that is not Escaped or Annihilated. Characters also swap all non-Integral Possessions (Free Drop any Item exceeding the Item Limit. Chosen by the active player.

abilities.name: Last Gasp
abilities.description: Upon reveal, Revive if Down or perform an Action.

abilities.name: Recorded Confessional
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, if Live choose a Colocated Human. All other Innocent players who have that Human as a Conspirator become Suspect.

abilities.name: Brutal
abilities.description: May use a Bludgeon to Down a Helmeted Human, at which point Annihilate both the Bludgeon and the Helmet

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.description: You may Activate Cyborg if Down and as your first action Revive Cyborg.

abilities.name: Point Break
abilities.description: If you are Live, Possess a Helmet, and are Colocated with Rocket Wings at Stationfall, you Escape

abilities.name: Root Access
abilities.description: As an Action Perform an Action with Any Robot that Possesses Digital Assistant. Ignore Self-Preservation

abilities.name: Trojan Horse
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, Copy Digital Assistant to an Unescaped Character that Possesses Evidence or X-Secret.

abilities.name: ZipGun
abilities.description: Upon reveal, gain a Gun.

abilities.name: Fake Artifact
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, unless Possessed by a PC, Artifact moves to Doctor event if it was Annihilated

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Upon reveal place a time marker in any Unescaped Section. When it resolves, Damage that Section.

abilities.name: Blood From a Stone
abilities.description: After using Kompromat on an NPC, return it to your hand.

abilities.name: Tradecraft
abilities.description: As an Action with Exile, discard two Kompromat from your hand and take a previously used NPC's Kompromat into your hand.

abilities.name: Offshore Shenanigans
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, regain your Bribe if it has been used.

abilities.name: Fine Print
abilities.description: You may activate NPCs Possessing NDA.

abilities.name: Hardcopy
abilities.description: As an Action, any Character Colocated with Legal can Manufacture a copy of NDA.

abilities.name: Go Go Go!
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, you may immediately perform an Action with each Live and Unescaped Clone.

abilities.name: Haywire
abilities.description: Gains a Bludgeon.

abilities.name: Infect
abilities.description: As an action, Contaminate a Colocated Human or Robot. If they have no empty item slots, they drop an Item of your choice. Humans and Robots can never have more than one Contamination.

abilities.name: Claymore
abilities.description: Peek at, then place 3 trap tokens face down in 3 different Sections. Flip each token after a Human, Robot, or Monster enters the Section and Down them if it is the trap. Traps never trigger Suspicion, Guilt, or Self-Preservation.

abilities.name: Never Gas Grenades
abilities.description: As an Action with Operative, place Asphyxiation Hazard in Operative's Section or a Section she can Throw to.

abilities.name: Authorized Force
abilities.description: Lose Peacekeeper (ability)

abilities.name: Forceful Presence
abilities.description: At the start of Station Chief's Activation phase you may perform a Free Basic Action with a Colocated NPC or with an NPC Officer anywhere.

abilities.name: Secret Cache
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, you or one of your Conspirators gains a Helmet.

abilities.name: Homework
abilities.description: Upon Reveal, you may Reveal you BC and perform one Action with that Character.

abilities.name: Enigma
abilities.description: If Schrödinger Reveal as Stranger, do not discard any card(s) (retain them as Bonus Characters). If Schrödinger Reveal as Stranger, then lose Uncanny.

abilities.name: My Precious
abilities.description: Other player may not Throw, Airlock or Drop you. You may still be Given to Colocated Characters.

abilities.name: Talk Them Through It
abilities.description: During your turn, if Troubleshooter is Live, your Conspirators move and act as though they have Jury Rig and Tunnel Rat.
